item.title: No more 'wimpy politics’: Van Hollen pushes Dems to get off the sidelines
item.description: “This job is not worth it if you constantly have to be putting your finger to the wind,” said Van Hollen (D), the Maryland senator, in a recent interv...

item.title: Trump administration eyes USAID money to advance America First goals
item.description: A State Department plan to reallocate close to $2 billion in foreign aid marks the latest challenge to Congress’ authority over federal spending.

item.title: In Wisconsin swing district, criticism of Charlie Kirk sparks backlash
item.description: The tensions coursing through the country have been on stark display, as a teacher and two city council members face a backlash over their words.

item.title: Democrats further narrow GOP’s House majority with Arizona special election win
item.description: Adelita Grijalva is the projected winner of the race to fill her father’s congressional seat, trimming a Republican House majority that was already hi...

item.title: Republican wins special election in Georgia, as Democrat makes gains
item.description: Party strategists were watching the state Senate vote in a ruby red district for some clues about voter attitudes ahead of the midterms.
